last_episode_to_air.name: Echoes of a Crime
last_episode_to_air.overview: As she opens up about her difficult childhood, Elize looks back at the last day of her trial, when the judge handed down a surprising sentence.

name: Elize Matsunaga: Once Upon a Crime
original_name: Elize Matsunaga: Era uma Vez um Crime
overview: The crime shocked Brazil: Elize Matsunaga shot and dismembered her rich husband. Featuring her first interview, this docuseries dives deep into the case.

episodes.name: Marital Status: Widow
episodes.overview: On a temporary release from prison, Elize details her troubled relationship with Marcos as people close to the case describe the aftermath of the crime.

episodes.name: A Princess Life
episodes.overview: Did Elize commit premeditated murder? She recalls how the prosecution used her past against her, with her motive and confession facing intense scrutiny.

episodes.name: Elize's Unfortunate Idea
episodes.overview: Elize recounts what she was thinking when she decided to dismember Marcos' body, and her attorney explains his trial strategy to sway public opinion.

episodes.name: Echoes of a Crime
episodes.overview: As she opens up about her difficult childhood, Elize looks back at the last day of her trial, when the judge handed down a surprising sentence.
